name: core
description: The Core module is a versatile collection of specialized modules designed to enhance the game development experience.

scripts.build: npx webpack && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js
scripts.build:prod: npx webpack --mode production && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js
